Plot: Tom has no choice but to move into a nursing home. Skeptical of his new bingo-playing, communal-dining world, all he wants is to be left alone with his books. He rejects every friendly overture, until one day, there is no way around it.
Title: Coming Home
Actors: Daniel Cornelissen, Reineke Jonker, Annelies Kaan, Coryse Kamping-Piekart
